name: Web Picross
description:
A web implementation of a Japanese newspaper puzzle made without JavaScript. It took about 15 hours to make over the span of a month. Click here for the level editor. You can copy the URL after clicking "play this picross" and share it with your friends so they can play the levels you make. You should also post your puzzles to the discussion board/community thing (which may be down below).

This game is also available here if you have issues with displaying it for whatever reason.
